S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-5866: Triggers fire out of order
Make sure the creation timestamp of a newly created trigger is higher than the timestamps of the existing triggers on the same table. If it is not higher, the triggers may fire in the wrong order. If the current timestamp is not higher than the timestamp of the previous trigger defined on the table, the new trigger now gets a creation timestamp that is one millisecond higher than the creation timestamp of the previous trigger.
